Summary: Driving down road between Cranberry Lake and StarLake
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around May 5th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were driving home from visit and observe what looked like a jet stream going straight up like 90 degree vertically so I took pics because I never saw a jet at a 90 degree vertical stream. The sun was not in the pics. The pics I have of the sun are very bright and overload the pictures. I have other pics of the sky that day in the same area. Because we were driving I was taking them quickly with my cell phone and didn't realize I had this object in the picture until I got home and was showing people pics of the clouds. It literally went straight up. Elizabeth Bishop was driving and observed the same thing. I have more pictures on my phone if you are interested.
